full_text:

> Wow, this is def. weird. I just got this. A real evp while doing a

> say?" and all else is spirit. Sounds to me like a Brit accent saying

> Ovilus, Robot Box, and now recording live.
>
> There's an odd noise before the male voice and a mumble after. Very
> weird. There was nothing except the RS Hack on at the time, but this
> didn't come over the radio.
>
> Wisteria
